text: Adheena is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Krishnadas, starring Shaji and Kasthuri in the lead role. ==Cast== * Shaji * Adoor Pankajam * Indrans * Jagannadhan * Jolly Easow * Kasthuri * Spadikam George ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Adheena
